Enumeration Type Documentation

enum SyncMLSyncType
 

Enumeration of the types of the supported synchronizations. Corresponds to the table of supported synchronizations in the SyncType element definition of the SyncML Device Information DTD.

Enumerator:
TwoWaySync  Two-way sync.
SlowTwoWaySync  Slow two-way sync.
OneWaySyncFromClient  One-way sync from client only.
RefreshSyncFromClient  Refresh sync from client only.
OneWaySyncFromServer  One-way sync from server only.
RefreshSyncFromServer  Refresh sync from server only.
ServerAlertedSync  Server alerted sync.
